Package org.eclipse.egf.core.ui.internal.viewers

Class Summary
AbstractObservableContentProvider Base class to implement an observable content provider.
BasicLabelProvider Basic label provider that handles NamedModelElementWithId and AbstractUiContainer objects.
CustomTooltipLabelProvider Provides a custom tool tip label provider to use in TreeViewer.
DecoratedModelLabelProvider Decorated label provider that handles NamedModelElementWithId and AbstractUiContainer objects.
Messages I18n helper.
ObservableArrayContentProvider This implementation of IStructuredContentProvider handles the case where the viewer input is a changing array of elements.
ObservablePatternElementContentProvider Implements the content provider for the pattern library production orchestration wizard page.
ObservableReferencedContractElementContentProvider Implements the content provider for the right viewer of the ContractElementReferenceWizardPage.
PossibleContractElementReferenceTreeContentProvider Implements the content provider for the left viewer of the ContractElementReferenceWizardPage.
